Id.description: Unique identifier for this payment (auto-generated, read-only).

Description.description: Optional description of the payment or its purpose

Enabled.description: Controls whether this EventItem is enabled

Triggers.description: Criteria that must be met for this payment to trigger

TargetId.description: Unique identifier for this payment (auto-generated, read-only).

TargetName.description: The target payee items name. Click the dropdown to select from all available Financial Items.

SetStateOnTrigger.description: When payment triggers, change the target item's EnabledBySim state based on 'Target State Action'

TargetStateOnTrigger.description: What to do with target item's state when payment triggers (only if 'Set target state on trigger' is enabled)

CashOut.description: Push Payment from this item to target

CashIn.description: Receive Payment from target to this item

Liquidate.description: If true, liquidate the target asset when trigger conditions are met. Transfers all funds to main savings account and disables the target. Only valid if target is an Asset type. Mutually exclusive with Cash In/Out Flow.

Id.description: Unique identifier for this trigger condition set (auto-generated, read-only).

Name.description: Optional name for debugging this trigger (e.g., 'Property Purchase Trigger')

TriggerMatchType.description: How to combine trigger condition results. All=all must pass, Any=any can pass, None=none should pass.

TriggerMatchValue.description: Value to compare condition results against for '1.1 - Trigger Match Type'.

TagMatchType.description: How to combine results from '2.2 - Tag Rules'. All=all rules must pass, Any=any rule can pass, None=no rules should pass.

TagRules.description:
Set of Tagged based Financial Item status checks.
No 'Tag Rules' = Trigger ignored.

StartDateProxy.description:
Trigger condition start date. Item will only be active on or after this date.
No Date = Check Disabled

EndDateProxy.description:
Trigger condition end date. Item will only be active on or before this date.
No Date = Check Disabled

LiquidAssets.description: Trigger when total liquid assets meet threshold criteria.

MainSavingsBalance.description: Trigger when main savings account balance meets threshold criteria.

Age.description: Trigger when user's age meets the threshold criteria.

MinAge.x-deprecatedMessage: Use Age ValueTrigger instead. Will be removed in future version.

MaxAge.x-deprecatedMessage: Use Age ValueTrigger instead. Will be removed in future version.

Id.description: Unique identifier for this tag conditional (auto-generated, read-only).

Name.description: Human-readable name for debugging this tag conditional (e.g., 'Requires Active Property')

Enabled.description: Whether this tag conditional is active and should be evaluated. If false, this conditional is skipped.

Description.description: Optional description of this tag conditional's purpose or role.

MatchType.description: All = all items must match, Any = at least one item must match, None = no items should match

MatchValue.description: true = items must be enabled, false = items must be disabled

Id.description: Unique identifier for this trigger (auto-generated, read-only).

Name.description: Optional name for this trigger (e.g., 'Emergency Fund Threshold')

Enabled.description: Enable or disable the entire trigger

Operator.description: Comparison operator to use: GreaterThan, GreaterThanOrEqual, LessThan, LessThanOrEqual, Equal, NotEqual

ComparisonValue.description: The value to compare against using the selected operator.

MinEnabled.x-deprecatedMessage: Use Operator and ComparisonValue instead. Will be removed in future version.

MinValue.x-deprecatedMessage: Use Operator and ComparisonValue instead. Will be removed in future version.

MaxEnabled.x-deprecatedMessage: Use Operator and ComparisonValue instead. Will be removed in future version.

MaxValue.x-deprecatedMessage: Use Operator and ComparisonValue instead. Will be removed in future version.

TriggerLimit.description: The maximum number of times the trigger can be activated. 0 = unlimited

TriggerCount.description: The number of times the trigger has been activated

LastTriggerDate.description: The date when the trigger was last activated

Comparator.description:
0 = Equal
1 = NotEqual
2 = GreaterThan
3 = GreaterThanOrEqual
4 = LessThan
5 = LessThanOrEqual

Id.description: Unique identifier for this payment (auto-generated, read-only).

Name.description: Optional name for this payment (e.g., 'Salary', 'Rent', 'Mortgage Interest')

Enabled.description: Enable or disable this payment/interest calculation

Amount.description: The value of the income or expense.

IsPercentage.description: If True Amount is treated as a percentage, if false Amount is a fixed value

PercentageBasis.description:
Sets if percentage calculations are based on Source or Destination value.
Source/Self: Calculate percentage of source item value.
Destination: Calculate percentage of target item value (EventItem only).
Note: FinancialItem AmountFreqs always use Self/Source (enforced by Sanitize).

AnnualRateMonthlyCompounding.description: If true, the interest rate is treated as an annual interest rate that is applied monthly. Schedule is set to Monthly and Is Percentage is set to true.

Schedule.description: Payment schedule and frequency (Daily, Weekly, Fortnightly, Monthly, Annual)

Id.description: Unique identifier for this TriggerFrequency (auto-generated, read-only).

Frequency.description: How often this trigger fires: Daily, Weekly, Fortnightly, Monthly, Annual

DayOfWeek.description: Day of week for Weekly/Fortnightly triggers. Only used if Frequency is Weekly or Fortnightly.

DayOfMonth.description: Day of month for Monthly/Annual triggers (1-31). 31 = last day of month. Only used if Frequency is Monthly or Annual.

MonthOfYear.description: Month for Annual triggers. Only used if Frequency is Annual.

TriggerLimit.description: Maximum times this trigger can fire (0 = unlimited, 1 = once, n = max n times)

LastTriggered.description: Date when this trigger last fired (null = never triggered)

TriggerCount.description: Number of times this trigger has fired (read-only)

DayOfWeek.description:
0 = Sunday
1 = Monday
2 = Tuesday
3 = Wednesday
4 = Thursday
5 = Friday
6 = Saturday

MonthOfYear.description:
1 = January
2 = February
3 = March
4 = April
5 = May
6 = June
7 = July
8 = August
9 = September
10 = October
11 = November
12 = December
